page.title: 11 Stormont Garage
page.content: On the 10th of July we went to Stormont garage where we interviewed a car sales representative. He said that there were four other Stormont Garages in Kent. At the garage they employ 32 staff and they service about twelve and a half thousand cars a year with very few complaints. They sell tyres but they don't make them. The most popular car they sell is the Escort and then the Orion and the cheapest car is the Fiesta Popular. One third of the cars in Sevenoaks are Ford. The most expensive piece of equipment is a hoist. They sell 95 different second hand cars. They have a car wash and they test all the second hand cars they sell at Otford Road. They also store information about car sales on computer.
